name: The Nature Conservancy
description: Works to conserve land and waters for nature and people around the world.

name: Sierra Club
description: Promotes environmental protection and supports efforts to combat climate change.

name: Environmental Defense Fund
description: Advocates for solutions to environmental challenges, including climate change.

name: Natural Resources Defense Council (NRDC)
description: Works to safeguard the earth and supports policies to address climate change.

name: World Wildlife Fund (WWF)
description: Works to protect nature and wildlife and addresses climate change.

name: 350.org
description: Engages in grassroots climate action and advocacy for a just transition.

name: The Climate Reality Project
description: Educates and mobilizes people to take action on climate change.

name: Environmental Working Group (EWG)
description: Advocates for healthier food, water, and a cleaner environment.

name: Climate Central
description: Provides climate science and information to help people make informed decisions.

name: Union of Concerned Scientists (UCS)
description: Advocates for science-based solutions to address climate change and other global issues.

name: Conservation International
description: Works to protect nature for the well-being of humanity, including addressing climate change.

name: Clean Air Task Force
description: Focuses on eliminating air pollution and addressing climate change through technology and policy solutions.

name: Earthjustice
description: Provides legal support for environmental protection and climate justice.

name: ClimateWorks Foundation
description: Supports efforts to mitigate climate change through philanthropy and strategic grants.

name: Rocky Mountain Institute
description: Drives the global energy transition and addresses climate change through research and collaboration.

name: Climate Group
description: Works with businesses and governments to accelerate climate action and clean technologies.

name: Rainforest Foundation US
description: Protects tropical rainforests and addresses climate change through indigenous rights.

name: Greenpeace USA
description: Takes action on climate change and other environmental issues through advocacy and direct action.

name: The Energy Foundation
description: Supports policies and innovation for a sustainable energy future and climate solutions.

name: Climate Reality Action Fund
description: Advocates for climate solutions and environmental justice through political action.
